communicationPlan.description: The device's communication plan. This is an indicator of network configuration.

customer.description: The customer associated with this device, if any. (Generally an enterprise or business unit.)

endConsumerId.description: The ID of the person, if any, associated with this device.

dateActivated.description: The date when the device was first activated.

dateAdded.description: The date when the device was first added.

dateUpdated.description: The date when the last device information update occurred.

dateShipped.description: The date when the device SIM was transferred from the service provider inventory into the account.

accountId.description: The account ID associated with the device.

fixedIPAddress.description: The IPv4 address assigned to the device. This field may be null if the device communication plan uses dynamic IP addresses or if the device uses an IPv6 address instead.

fixedIpv6Address.description: TThe IPv6 address assigned to the device. This field may be null if the device communication plan uses dynamic IP addresses or if the device uses an IPv4 address instead.

operatorCustom1.description: Values for any custom device fields the service provider has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with service provider roles only.

operatorCustom2.description: Values for any custom device fields the service provider has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with service provider roles only.

operatorCustom3.description: Values for any custom device fields the service provider has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with service provider roles only.

operatorCustom4.description: Values for any custom device fields the service provider has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with service provider roles only.

operatorCustom5.description: Values for any custom device fields the service provider has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with service provider roles only.

accountCustom1.description: Values for any custom device fields the enterprise has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with account roles only.

accountCustom2.description: Values for any custom device fields the enterprise has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with account roles only.

accountCustom3.description: Values for any custom device fields the enterprise has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with account roles only.

accountCustom4.description: Values for any custom device fields the enterprise has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with account roles only.

accountCustom5.description: Values for any custom device fields the enterprise has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with account roles only.

accountCustom6.description: Values for any custom device fields the enterprise has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with account roles only.

accountCustom7.description: Values for any custom device fields the enterprise has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with account roles only.

accountCustom8.description: Values for any custom device fields the enterprise has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with account roles only.

accountCustom9.description: Values for any custom device fields the enterprise has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with account roles only.

accountCustom10.description: Values for any custom device fields the enterprise has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with account roles only.

customerCustom1.description: Values for any custom device fields the customer has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with customer roles only.

customerCustom2.description: Values for any custom device fields the customer has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with customer roles only.

customerCustom3.description: Values for any custom device fields the customer has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with customer roles only.

customerCustom4.description: Values for any custom device fields the customer has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with customer roles only.

customerCustom5.description: Values for any custom device fields the customer has created in Control Center. This information is applicable to users with customer roles only.

simNotes.description: Information the service provider has added about the device.

deviceID.description: Optional identifier that an account or customer can give to a device.

modemID.description: The modem used by the device to transmit data.

globalSimType.description: Indicates whether the device is using a primary SIM from the lead service provider or a virtual subscription from a partner service provider.
